diff_act: 7.alert the operator when attempting to execute functions beyond the permitted interaction level

regen.absent_element: action to handle the assessment of achievable interaction levels in Normal and Recovery Startup Modes
regen.new_specification: The TCS shall assess and adjust its interaction levels according to the Startup Mode, ensuring that only supported levels are allowed during startup.

label: The TCS shall inform the operator if the operator attempts to execute a function prohibited as a result of the determined level of interaction.
absence: Warning for execution of functions prohibited according to determined interaction levels
